panel.title: Uso de memoria por tipo y dispositivo

search.query: index=yang sourcetype=netconf:memory | stats latest("yang_data.used-memory") as used, latest("yang_data.total-memory") as total by "yang_data.name", device_name | eval usage_pct = round((used/total)*100, 2)

chart.title: Tendencia de uso de memoria (l√≠nea temporal)

search.query: index=yang sourcetype=netconf:memory | timechart span=1h avg(yang_data.used-memory) as used_mem by device_name
index=yang sourcetype=netconf:memory device_name=csr-lab | stats latest(yang_data.used-memory) as used by yang_data.name | rename yang_data.name as memory_type

index=yang sourcetype=netconf:memory device_name=csr-lab "yang_data.name"="Processor" | stats latest(yang_data.used-memory) as used_bytes | eval used_mb = round(used_bytes / 1048576, 2) | stats latest(used_mb)

index=yang sourcetype=netconf:memory | stats latest(yang_data.used-memory) as used, latest(yang_data.total-memory) as total by yang_data.name, device_name | eval usage_pct = round((used / total) * 100, 2) | sort - usage_pct
